title: Does a barrier (gloves, sleeves..) between my hands & knees (ruku) break my prayer? Assim al hakeem
transcript: muhammad from the u.s says if there's a barrier between my hand and my knee such as my sleeves such as a glove would that impact the prayer the answer is definitely not nothing would impact your prayer because bowing or record is to bend your back so that you are bowing and you place your hands on your knees whether you're wearing gloves or there are there is a jacket or an over jacket or whatever has no impact none whatsoever
